name: Rocket Bots
description:
A simple game to practice your rocket launching skills!

Shoot rockets at your rivals to gain a score.

Features

  • Rocket jumping
  • Health packs
  • Homing missiles

Settings

You can change various settings of the game: how many bots to spawn, rocket speed and other.

Controls

  • WASD - Movement
  • Shift - Sprint
  • C - Dash
  • Left Mouse Button - Fire
  • Right Mouse Button - Missiles Mode
